references: I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration, Wiley, N.Y., 1983,(2.3.14).
formula: G.f.: (3+14*x+8*x^2+2*x^3)/(1-x)^4. Generally, g.f. for k-th column of A046741 is coefficient of y^k in expansion of (1-y)/((1-y-y^2)*(1-y)-(1+y)*x).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 04 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 06 2001
